content:
DesignerEventArgs Class

Definition

Provides data for the DesignerCreated and DesignerDisposed events.

In this Article

public class DesignerEventArgs : EventArgs
Inheritance
Object
EventArgs
DesignerEventArgs

Inherited Members

Empty
Equals(Object)
Equals(Object, Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object, Object)
ToString()

Examples

The following example demonstrates creating a DesignerEventArgs. 

// This example method creates a DesignerEventArgs using the specified designer host.
// Typically, this type of event args is created by the IDesignerEventService.  
public DesignerEventArgs CreateComponentEventArgs(IDesignerHost host)
{
    DesignerEventArgs args = new DesignerEventArgs(host);

    // The designer host of the created or disposed document:  args.Component

    return args;
}

// This example method creates a DesignerEventArgs using the specified designer host.
// Typically, this type of event args is created by the IDesignerEventService.
DesignerEventArgs^ CreateComponentEventArgs( IDesignerHost^ host )
{
   DesignerEventArgs^ args = gcnew DesignerEventArgs( host );

   // The designer host of the created or disposed document:  args.Component

   return args;
}

' This example method creates a DesignerEventArgs using the specified designer host.
' Typically, this type of event args is created by the IDesignerEventService.  
Public Function CreateComponentEventArgs(ByVal host As IDesignerHost) As DesignerEventArgs

    Dim args As New DesignerEventArgs(host)

    ' The designer host of the created or disposed document:  args.Component

    Return args

End Function

Remarks

The DesignerCreated and DesignerDisposed events are raised when a document is created or disposed of.

Constructors

DesignerEventArgs(IDesignerHost)

Initializes a new instance of the DesignerEventArgs class.

public DesignerEventArgs (System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost host);
Parameters
host
IDesignerHost

The IDesignerHost of the document.

Properties

Designer

Gets the host of the document.

public System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost Designer { get; }
Value
IDesignerHost

The IDesignerHost of the document.
